remarks: One direction of ~ isperp2 (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 10-Nov-2019.)
statement:
isperp.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
isperp.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
isperp.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
isperp.l $e |- L = ( LineG ` G ) $.
isperp.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
isperp.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. ran L ) $.
isperp2.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. ran L ) $.
isperp2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( A i^i B ) ) $.
isperp2d.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. A ) $.
isperp2d.v $e |- ( ph -> V e. B ) $.
isperp2d.p $e |- ( ph -> A ( perpG ` G ) B ) $.
isperp2d $p |- ( ph -> <" U X V "> e. ( raG ` G ) ) $.
